subject: Law
title: Restorative Justice
description: A quick win: understand Restorative Justice.

hook.text: A burglary victim sat across from the teenager who broke into her home. They talked. She forgave him.

buildup.text: Restorative justice focuses on repairing harm rather than simply punishing offenders.

discovery.text: Programs bring victims, offenders, and community members together to address the impact of the crime.

twist.text: Studies show restorative justice reduces recidivism more effectively than traditional punishment for many offenses.

climax.text: It's not about being soft on crimeâ€”it's about outcomes. Less reoffending means fewer future victims.

punchline.text: Punishment asks what law was broken. Restoration asks who was harmed.

quiz.question: What is the primary focus of restorative justice?
options: Repairing harm caused by the crime
